Class DataTablesBuilder<E extends Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.ais.commons.application.util.jquery.datatables.DataTablesBuilder<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - determines the type of each search result

extends Object
    Utility class for building jQuery DataTables input data.

    1.0.1

        Re-creates the selection of data visible on UI using HTTP request parameters.
